info.title: Wsdot Weather Information API
info.description: Wsdot Weather Information API - Washington State Department of Transportation APIs

Description.description: Human-readable description of the roadway location, such as interchange names or cross streets.

Direction.description: Traffic direction designation: N, S, B, NB, or SB, indicating which side of the highway is affected.

Latitude.description: Latitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

Longitude.description: Longitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

MilePost.description: Milepost marker along the highway corridor, with 0 indicating route terminus.

RoadName.description: Highway or route designation code, such as '005' for I-5 or '090' for I-90.

RoadwayLocation.description: Roadway location information including route, milepost, coordinates, and direction.

BarometricPressure.description: Atmospheric pressure in millibars (not adjusted for elevation).

Latitude.description: Latitude of the weather station in decimal degrees.

Longitude.description: Longitude of the weather station in decimal degrees.

ReadingTime.description: UTC datetime when the weather reading was taken.

StationID.description: Numeric ID of the weather station.

StationName.description: Display name of the weather station.

TemperatureInFahrenheit.description: Current air temperature in degrees Fahrenheit.

Visibility.description: Average visibility distance in meters (computed every 3 minutes).

WindDirection.description: Wind direction in degrees clockwise from north (0-359).

WindGustSpeedInMPH.description: Maximum wind gust speed in miles per hour.

WindSpeedInMPH.description: Average wind speed in miles per hour.

FetchWeatherInformationOutput.description: Current atmospheric conditions from a WSDOT Road Weather Information System station, including temperature, humidity, wind, visibility, barometric pressure, and precipitation.

FetchWeatherInformationByStationIdInputS.description: Numeric ID of the weather station.

FetchCurrentWeatherForStationsInputStati.description: Comma-separated list of weather station IDs.

SearchWeatherInformationInputStationIDPa.description: Numeric ID of the weather station.

SearchWeatherInformationInputSearchStart.description: UTC datetime when the search time range begins (ISO-8601 format).

SearchWeatherInformationInputSearchEndTi.description: UTC datetime when the search time range ends (ISO-8601 format).

FetchWeatherInformationByStationIdInputS.description: Numeric ID of the weather station.
FetchWeatherInformationByStationIdInputS.name: StationID

FetchCurrentWeatherForStationsInputStati.description: Comma-separated list of weather station IDs.
FetchCurrentWeatherForStationsInputStati.name: StationList

SearchWeatherInformationInputStationIDPa.description: Numeric ID of the weather station.
SearchWeatherInformationInputStationIDPa.name: StationID

SearchWeatherInformationInputSearchStart.description: UTC datetime when the search time range begins (ISO-8601 format).
SearchWeatherInformationInputSearchStart.name: SearchStartTime

SearchWeatherInformationInputSearchEndTi.description: UTC datetime when the search time range ends (ISO-8601 format).
SearchWeatherInformationInputSearchEndTi.name: SearchEndTime

get.summary: List current weather information for all stations.

sampleResponse.description: Example of a successful response from the API (showing first item of 101 total)

value.StationName: S 144th St on SB I-5 at mp 155.32

get.summary: Get current weather information for a specific station by ID.

sampleResponse.description: Example of a successful response from the API

value.StationName: S 144th St on SB I-5 at mp 155.32

get.summary: Get current weather information for multiple specified stations.

sampleResponse.description: Example of a successful response from the API (showing first item of 3 total)

value.StationName: S 144th St on SB I-5 at mp 155.32

get.summary: Search historical weather information for a station within a time range.

sampleResponse.description: Example of a successful response from the API (showing first item of 47 total)

value.StationName: Rocky Canyon on I-90 at mp 95.74

tags.name: weather-info
tags.description: Current atmospheric conditions from WSDOT Road Weather Information System stations.
tags.x-description: Real-time temperature, humidity, wind conditions, visibility, barometric pressure, and precipitation data for transportation operations.
x-useCases: Assess road weather conditions for transportation management.
Monitor atmospheric data for traveler safety decisions.
Display current weather conditions at specific stations.
Query historical weather data by station and time range.
